name: NavThemes Landing Pages – Free WordPress Landing Pages Plugin
author: NavThemes

sections.installation:
1. Upload navthemes-landing-pages to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.description:
NavThemes Landing pages is free WordPress landing page plugin which let you create beautiful landing pages in minutes. Comes with 3 Pre-built design which is SEO ready and Speed Optimised, this is a go plugin for your any landing page need.

Most of the plugins have quite difficult to understand the lengthy structure of usage. This plugin the most feasible option as it has easy to use structure. It is fully compatible with Gutenberg and Woocommerce.

You can create the desired landing pages which could completely meet your purpose. Whether it is for a personal blog, business website or online shopping portal, NavThemes WordPress landing page is an ultimate choice.

Features at a glance :
– Gutenberg Compatible
– Woocommerce Compatible
– Drag and Drop interface
– Conversion Ready
– 3 Prebuilt Designs
– Speed Optimized
– Shortcodes Supported in the landing page.
– Contact Form 7 Support
– Translation Ready – Coming Soon
– Custom CSS & JavaScript – Coming Soon
– Custom SEO for landing pages – Coming soon
– Yoast SEO Support – Coming Soon

The detailed description of the above-mentioned features:

Gutenberg Compatible
Gutenburg is an amazing content editor which is used for website optimization. NavThemes Landing Pages are designed in such a way that they are easily compatible with Gutenberg editor.

Woocommerce Compatible
NavThemes WordPress Landing Pages are Woocommerce Compatible. You can create a highly efficient user-friendly online retail platform.

Drag and Drop interface
NavThemes WordPress Landing Pages comes with user-friendly Drag and Drop interface. Well, this is the main feature WordPress landing page builder.

Conversion Ready
The landing pages you will get are so attractive that conversions may take in seconds! You can customize a form that can be inserted. They are eye catchy and unique enough to get overwhelming responses.

3 Prebuilt Designs
Ready to use designs are available in our WordPress landing page plugin. Simply upload these designs to your website and it’s done! You can further customize them with drag and drop editor.

Speed Optimized
One of the major demands of any website owner is high speed. Speed matters as if the speed won’t be fast enough, visitors may back off. NavThemes Landing Pages are speed-optimized so you won’t face any such issue if you use this landing page

Shortcodes Supported in the landing page
Have you yet not finalized a domain? Or tend to change it soon? Well to meet this purpose you need shortcodes by using which you can easily convert the website with changing the content. Shortcodes aren’t supported on many landing pages but our plugin completely supports it.

Contact Form 7 Support
If you want to add Contact Form 7 to NavThemes landing page, you can do it hassle-free. The plugin completely supports it.

Translation Ready – Coming Soon
Custom CSS & JavaScript – Coming Soon
Yoast SEO Support – Coming Soon

These were the top features of NavThemes Landing Pages that makes it most suitable for any business or personal website. Use NavThemes Landing Pages to build up a perfect website hassle-free.

For any feature request please mail at enquiry@navthemes.com or follow us on Facebook
